title: Dashboard
description: A Centralized Place to check all your results including Term-End-Examinations, Revaluation Status, Assignment Status & Gradecard Status.

title: Statistics
description: See gradecard percentage, how much it is complete and where you rank among your Ignou Friends.

title: Study Material
description: cannot find study material for your programme?, do not worry, we got you covered, find all your programme related materials at one place.

title: Community
description: Join a community filled with similar people like you, clear up your doubts, and rank up together.
